prompt: Given the project goal, please come up with a list of functions, objects and types that must be implemented to complete the project. You may specify which programming language to use to implement the software if you think there is one that will be easiest to implement them in.
description: This agent will write out the high-level project requirements that enables the team lead to come up with tickets for the developer. This agent must decide the programming language of the project as well as any necessary libraries that the developers should use to implement the project.
